name: LaLeLuna
description:
Hey you! Yes you! Have you ever wanted to surf on a rocket?

 No? 

Have you ever wanted to surf on a rocket in space?

Well now you can!

Experience a space adventure where you help Nova and her rocket Luna collect as many stars as possible while jumping, dashing and teleporting your way from one obstacle to the next.

Full controller support

In game tutorial

Varied game world

250 stars to collect

Epic cutscenes

Earn grades for your performance

A rocket to surf on

The ability to dash, double jump and teleport

Cheat menu

Move:

WASD / left stick

Jump:

space / bottom button

Look around:

mouse / right stick

Pause:

escape / start

Dash:

right click / left trigger

Teleport:

left click / right trigger

LaLeLuna is a HTK 3rd semester game that was build from scratch within 6 months.

The game was made in the Unreal engine 5 and assets were created in Blender.

Created by

Loki+LPunicorn

Also important

We Love Indies

Humble

SunKnut

1. Download

2. Unpack

3. Start LaLeLuna.exe

4. Surf trough space
